api_error: We are having some trouble in our servers.
share_result_dialog_body:
This a the result of a private draw, if you want to share the results of a draw you should create it publicly.
You will be able to schedule when the results will be made public and share a link with the participants so they can see the results live.
share_result_dialog_title: Create raffle publicly to share the results
datepicker_only_future_date_valid: You have to choose a date in the future
